name: auto-status-pro
description: AutoStatusPro is a comprehensive vehicle management system that allows businesses to track the status of their vehicles at each stage of the process, from check-in to delivery. With customizable workflows and a user-friendly interface, AutoStatusPro simplifies vehicle management for admins and helps optimize performance.

scripts.commit: sh -c 'git add . && git commit -m "$0" && git push -u origin main'

author: Elias Murcray
